title: EGOR font
content:
[http://public.burocratik.com/egor.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106162158/http:/public.burocratik.com/egor.gif "http://public.burocratik.com/egor.gif")

I need to rebuild this logo, which fonts? Identifont didn’t came out with a valid one for the “opened R”. The upload image fuction is not working...  
Thanks

 [‹ Anyone seen this one before?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106162158/http:/typophile.com/node/12367 "Go to previous forum topic") [This might be tough... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106162158/http:/typophile.com/node/12354 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adriano

comments.content:
Looks like Eras Ultra to me.

[link](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106162158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-eras/ultra/testdrive.html?s=EGOR&p=48)

I don’t know how to link to a new window anymore... but am glad it don’t look like crap.

YVES: A ONE MINUTE ID!!!

Patty: add target="\_blank" after the URL in your code.

\<a href="http://url" target="\_blank"\>linked text\</a\>
Thanks - Dav suggested that as well. It’s a bit more complicated than before but I’ll pick it up.
As an Identifier, I wouldn’t worry too much about “new window” attributes. I think most users will be able to go back and forth or initiate a new page on their own.
If you hold down shift whilst clicking the link, it should open automagically in a new window.

Hmmm. Not on the mac.

I just need to get used to the new formatting style.  
It was a little easier before. No biggie.

Wait - there was an easier way before? I always used to put target=”\_blank” in.

- Lex
Patty, on the mac, just hold down Apple and click. It should open the link in a new tab on both firefox and safari.

Yes!

I am (embarrassingly) still in OS 9. Publishing...

and yes, Lex, there was a much easier way before - you just typed \newurl{ before your link (and then close bracket at the end). I’m still getting the hang of the new site.
Dear ITC, It’s time to retire Eras for at least 20 years until it becomes ironic.
Come on Joe, half of the pharma packaging would have to be redesigned if Eras would be “verboten”. Put Optima and Helvetica on that list too and you’d only have blank packaging ; )

_YVES: A ONE MINUTE ID!!!_

Sorry if I appear to be a little absent these days, but I’m still not used to the disappearance of e-mail notification... New posts within a thread don’t show up in the RSS reader and this sucks. Big time. :-(

I’ll let everyone know when my moderator / administrator privileges will be back. Until then, have fun and play nice. ;-)
Yves, what you are now a mortal, no superpowers? Oh the evil demons of a beta site.
My only superpower left for the moment is resistance to moisture and low temperatures. ;-)
